endpoints.description: Create a new patient profile allowing association with health metrics.
Retrieve a list of registered patients in the system.
Return detailed information about a specific patient using their unique ID.
Submit health metric readings from specific sensors for a patient.
Retrieve all health metric readings within a specified time frame.
Fetch all health metric readings associated with a particular patient.
Create an alert based on predefined thresholds for health metrics.
Retrieve the list of active alerts requiring attention.
Update information related to a specific patient profile.
Remove a patient's profile and associated data from the system.
